google-description: In this article we answer your questions: how to get there? How long ? What's the best time to visit ? We also tell you where it's located and what budget to plan. All with our travelogue and photos of this amazing Japanese garden.
social-network-description: Hidden in the middle of skyscrapers lies a true haven of peace, the HamaRikyu Garden. It is the perfect place to recharge your batteries in the middle of the largest megalopolis in the world.
